response.overview: "Har Har Mahadeva" is a devotional music film marking the debut of multi-talented creator Ashoksaravanan in the spiritual genre. Released on the auspicious occasion of Maha Sivarathiri in 2026, the project is a cinematic and auditory homage to Lord Shiva. Ashoksaravanan spearheads the vision as the vocalist, lyricist, co-composer, sound engineer, and editor, crafting a deeply personal and immersive offering. The piece blends traditional devotional fervor with modern digital production techniques, utilizing tools like FL Studio, DaVinci Resolve, and AI-assisted composition models. It stands as a testament to independent artistic creation, produced entirely under Ashoksaravanan's banner, weaving together music, technology, and faith into a singular experiential tribute.
response.tagline: A digital offering. A spiritual journey.
response.title: Har Har Mahadeva
